name: Steampunk LevelDesign Project
description:
A short level of a stealth story based game in a steampunk environment!

You enter the main city where a recent riot has occurred, the poor people of the city are suffering from the giant generator in the centre of the city polluting their air and making the citizens sick,  the people have had enough and want it turned off, you decide to take a closer look at the rioting but the road is blocked and you'll need to find another way around.

All NPCs are meant to be avoided if i finished coding the game :)

Hope you enjoy! I made everything from scratch myself :D grey boxed in unreal and then key assets taken out into Maya and modelled and textured :D

part of a 1 week level design project
